product_name: Salomon Siam Cross-Country Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: The lightweight Salomon Siam cross-country ski poles complete the ski package for beginner to intermediate skiers. Fiberglass composite shafts have a top diameter of 16mm and a bottom diameter of 11mm. EVA grips and adjustable straps comfortably support hands and wrists; straps are lined with faux fur for extra comfort. Touring baskets are suitable for in-track skiing yet provide enought flotation in powder for light out-of-track excursions. Salomon Siam cross-country ski poles feature steel tips that bite into icy slopes.
short_description: The lightweight Salomon Siam cross-country ski poles complete the ski package for beginner to intermediate skiers.
